specialTraits.name: Lightning Absorption
specialTraits.description: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed creature is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

savingThrow.effect: takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe

specialTraits.name: Distress Spores
specialTraits.description: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

specialTraits.name: Sun Sickness
specialTraits.description: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The myconid uses either its Hallucination Spores or its Pacifying Spores, then makes a fist attack.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (3d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Hallucination Spores (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target is incapacitated while it hallucinates.

savingThrow.effect: poisoned for 1 minute and incapacitated while it hallucinates

actions.name: Pacifying Spores (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute.

actions.name: Animating Spores (3/Day)
actions.description: The myconid targets one corpse of a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast within 5 feet of it and releases spores at the corpse. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a spore servant.
